content.title: Front-end Developer
content.description: Hi, I have been working with web development for about 11 years, I'm graduated in Information Systems and also in Technical Programming. I participate in open source projects on Github and I'm a great Javascript enthusiast, At the moment I'm working at Adyen, one of the greatest payments platform in the world. Would you like to know more about me? Check it out my {link1} and {link2}.
